item.description:
We're celebrating Stuart's Birthday with a wine and app night. So come and wish the Birthday Boy a very Happy Birthday!

 

We'll be at Stuart's place to mark the occasion. Bring a bottle of wine and an app, or snack, to share...and let's do it up right! Come say hi...and spend some time with great people and good friends...old and new. Ladies, make sure you give Stuart a big hug and kiss. Men, well, just make sure you come...lol!!!
item.how_to_find_us: You won't be able to miss us! Look for the Birthday Boy's Balloon!!!

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: A Wine Night Birthday Celebration for Stuart!!!
